snippet.title: Wii Sports Resort (Wii) - Longplay
snippet.description:
Originally recorded for https://www.longplays.org

Wii Sports Resort is a sports video game developed and published by Nintendo for the Wii video game console, and is a direct sequel to Wii Sports. It is one of the first titles to require the Wii MotionPlus accessory, which was bundled with the game. Wii Sports Resort was first announced at E3 2008 and was released in Japan on June 25, 2009 and in nearly all other regions in the following month. While the game was originally released only as a stand-alone title, as of 2009 the game was bundled with newer Wii consoles, along with Wii Sports.

In this longplay i do not 100%, i showcase only all singleplayer modes in the sports.

Swordplay
-
Duel (1 match)
Speed Slice (1 match)
Showdown (1 stage)

Wakeboarding (beginner difficulty)

Frisbee
-
Dog
Golf (18 Holes)

Archery (all difficultys)

Basketball
-
3-Point Contest
Pickup Game

Table Tennis
-
2 Matches (11 and 6 point game)
Return Challenge

Golf (3 Holes cause i had no nervs for that)

Bowling
-
Standard Game
100-Pin
Spin Control

Power Cruising Slalom Course (course 1-3)

Canoeing Speed Challenge (beginner difficulty)

Cycling Road Race (1 course race, course 1-3)

Air Sports
-
Skydiving
Island Flyover (1 round)
